title: Everything Wrong With American Horror Story "Pilot"
author: TVSins
comment: You should do the beginning episode of each season of AHS  :D not gonna lie tho, I love this show
Call me Jesus 'cause I'm taking away all the sins. Lol so good
Jump cut! Another jump cut! Jump cut to car trunk! Strange angle from overhead! Look back! Zoom! Shaky cam! Zoom! Cut! Cut! Cut! Behold the fear we have created! gold.
Doing a "previously" with Supernatural without Carry on my wayward son. Ding.
I just noticed the SINSUNG at the bottom, and it cracked me up.
description:
American Horror Story is for sure American, but we aren't quite sure about how much actual horror or story is involved. One thing we do know is involved? Sins.

Next week we file in some time for some extraterrestrial sins.

To get an early looks at every sins video and podcast and other fun perks, feel free to support at Patreon!
